Based on the final state \\( L[T[\\hat{T}[u]]](x) \\), can we precisely determine whether the original function was subjected to both \\( T \\) and \\( \\hat{T} \\) or only one of them, without any additional information?

The transformations could potentially generate similar outcomes making their individual effects indistinct.
